Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array

by

January 19, 2021
in Algorithm

Sorted Array

Why not indeed!

class RemoveDuplicatesFromSortedArray {
    func removeDuplicates(inout nums: [Int]) -> Int {
        guard nums.count > 0 else {
            return 0
        }
        
        var index = 0
        
        for num in nums where num != nums[index] {
            index += 1
            nums[index] = num
        }
        
        return index + 1
    }
}
Tags: Algorithm
